content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Technical Community\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a framework to share knowledge, experience, expertise and just valuable information with colleagues across the company. There is a great place to develop professional network and to find people who can help you in developing your technology career objectives. There is a thrilled opportunity to get fun from engineering excellence. A way to shift your technical skills and technology craftsmanship outside of your current project. Or just a community to find great friends you will enjoy to work together.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Technical Community gives amazing opportunities to any engineer. That allows you to become a familiar with new technologies and new approaches, its application on real projects and real business. In the same time there is a chance to know more about colleagues and projects that are around in the large engineering corporation. That gives you an overview on projects and opportunities that could be part of your career, part of your success realization as a technology leader and strong professional.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the same time EPAM Technical Community provides ability to get public speaking experience, get experience in developing presentation and present them to corresponding auditory. That gives you a chance to try your presentation on people who give a positive constructive feedback with pleasure. That will help you to improve your presentation skills and your material, to prepare for more challenging presentation to customers, to make an awesome technical speech for a conference and other events that are part of any strong engineer career.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Technical Community is not only a place for engineering growth but it is a really great start for a leadership growth. You can always take a leadership role in the community and help to identify its path in the community domain and events. That's a pretty valuable step in developing career at EPAM to be a leader: a technology leader or a community leader. That's gives a green light to your career as a Solution Architect or as a Principal Engineer.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are an experienced professional and takes principal role that gives you a chance to build a group of people who shares and fellows your ideas, your technological vision and makes your ideas successful, makes company successful and allows to win more opportunities as for yourself as for people who support you and the company who makes progress in developing engineering expertise and in developing engineering services.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Technical Community can be a great start of developing something valuable within the company to take leadership over a new project, a new product or even a new direction in the company business.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"And of course EPAM Technical Community is a tremendous opportunity to build your own social network with people who shares your vision, your ideas. People who work together with you in the engineering enterprise company. People who will be part of your team and part of your success in the EPAM. And the value that you bring to the EPAM Community returns to you with all the experience that the company has built.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With all questions mail to: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:OrgTechnicalCommunitiesUA@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Org Technical Communities UA\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Post updates on communities and technologies online
